messages.subject: I'm back...
messages.msgSnippet: Not that anyone really missed me... But I sure did miss the groups... Wow amazing activity! So I m venturing to guess most people who were active in the Miburo
messages.messageBody:
Not that anyone really missed me... But I sure did miss the groups...
Wow amazing activity! So I'm venturing to guess most people who were
active in the Miburo group moved here ne? What else? I feel so lost,
don't know where to start reading and commenting (intelligently
hopefully). ^_^
